Name: London Cosmopolitan
Ingredients: 2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
Review: A Cosmopolitan but made with London dry gin in place of vodka.
History: A subtle twist on the classic Cosmopolitan created in 2008 by yours truly at The Cabinet Room in London, England. Cosmopolitan cocktail history .
Nutrition: One serving of London Cosmopolitan contains 151 calories
